contained.name: add
contained.title: add
contained.description:
Addition of a differential amount to this quantity. 

The value of accuracy in the result is either:

* the sum of the accuracies of the operands, if both present, or;
* unknown, if either or both operand accuracies are unknown.

contained.name: subtract
contained.title: subtract
contained.description:
Result of subtracting a differential amount from this quantity.

The value of `_accuracy_` in the result is either:

* the sum of the accuracies of the operands, if both present, or;
* unknown, if either or both operand accuracies are unknown.

contained.name: diff
contained.title: diff
contained.description:
Difference of two quantities.

The value of accuracy in the result is either:

* the sum of the accuracies of the operands, if both present, or;
* unknown, if either or both operand accuracies are unknown.

name: DV_ABSOLUTE_QUANTITY
title: DV_ABSOLUTE_QUANTITY
description: Abstract class defining the concept of quantified entities whose values are absolute with respect to an origin. Dates and Times are the main example.

element.short: Abstract class defining the concept of quantified entities whose values are absolute with respect to an origin.
element.definition: Abstract class defining the concept of quantified entities whose values are absolute with respect to an origin. Dates and Times are the main example.
